title: About me
body: I am an OpenSource Enthusiast. I contribute mostly to the Foreman Project and its eco-system that revolves around it. I am a Red Hat Certified Architect in Infrastructure with certifications in technologies like Anisble, OpenShift, Puppet and Hybrid Cloud Management.  Contact  Github: rabajaj0509 Twitter: @rabajaj_ Email: rahulrb0509@gmail.com & rabajaj@redhat.com
